CALL FOR PAPERS
LAST DATE OF SUBMISSION : 10- October 2019
Acceptance Notification : Within 10 days
Manuscript Publication : Within 3 days after Registration
A PEER REVIEWED REFEREED MONTHLY INTERNATIONAL JOURNAL
Current Issue October, 2019 (Volume 08 - Issue 10)








All accepted papers from AJER 2019 will be published in the  
American journal of Engineering Research
 (online issue ISSN 2320-0847) (print issue ISSN 2320-0936)  (

Features & Benefits of AJER Authors:
Fast & Easy paper publishing process.
AJER provides individual 

American National Engineering Database (ANED)

 number to every article.
AJER provides individual 

Digitally Signed E-Certificate

 to all Authors.
Authors are required to submit the full paper (PDF and Word format) to the  ajer@editormails.com
